trans-unit.source: The state of an entity object.
trans-unit.target: 엔터티 개체의 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: The object context must know the state of an object to save changes back to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 개체 컨텍스트에서는 개체의 상태에 대해 알고 있어야만 변경 내용을 데이터 소스에 다시 저장할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry> objects store <xref:System.Data.EntityState> information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry> 개체는 <xref:System.Data.EntityState> 정보를 저장합니다.

trans-unit.source: The `SaveChanges` methods of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> process entities that are attached to the context and update the data source depending on the <xref:System.Data.EntityState> of each object.
trans-unit.target: `SaveChanges`의 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 메서드는 컨텍스트에 연결된 엔터티를 처리하고 각 개체의 <xref:System.Data.EntityState>에 따라 데이터 소스를 업데이트합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Creating, Adding, Modifying, and Deleting Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f76f1fad-c553-4b59-820b-89b3dec2fad1).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [만들기, 추가, 수정, 및 개체 삭제](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f76f1fad-c553-4b59-820b-89b3dec2fad1)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The state of objects inside an object context is managed by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>.
trans-unit.target: 개체 컨텍스트의 개체 상태는 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>에서 관리됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To find out the state of an object, call one of the following <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager> methods: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager.TryGetObjectStateEntry%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager.GetObjectStateEntry%2A>, or <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager.GetObjectStateEntries%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 개체 상태를 확인하려면 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>의 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager.TryGetObjectStateEntry%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager.GetObjectStateEntry%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager.GetObjectStateEntries%2A> 메서드 중 하나를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry> defines the state of the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry.State%2A>의 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry> 속성은 개체의 상태를 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object is new, has been added to the object context, and the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> method has not been called.
trans-unit.target: 새 개체로, 개체 컨텍스트에 추가되었으며 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> 메서드가 호출되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: After the changes are saved, the object state changes to <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Unchanged" />.
trans-unit.target: 변경 내용이 저장된 후에는 개체 상태가 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Unchanged" />로 변경됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Objects in the <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Added" /> state do not have original values in the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Added" /> 상태의 개체는 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" />에 원래 값을 가지고 있지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The object has been deleted from the object context.
trans-unit.target: 개체가 개체 컨텍스트에서 삭제되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: After the changes are saved, the object state changes to <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Detached" />.
trans-unit.target: 변경 내용이 저장된 후에는 개체 상태가 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Detached" />로 변경됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The object exists but is not being tracked.
trans-unit.target: 개체가 있지만 추적되고 있지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: An entity is in this state immediately after it has been created and before it is added to the object context.
trans-unit.target: 엔터티는 만들어진 직후 개체 컨텍스트에 추가되기 전에 이 상태가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An entity is also in this state after it has been removed from the context by calling the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Detach(System.Object)" /> method or if it is loaded by using a <see cref="F:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption.NoTracking" /><see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Detach(System.Object)" /><see cref="F:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption.NoTracking" />을 사용하여 로드된 경우 또는 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" /> 메서드를 호출하여 컨텍스트에서 제거된 후에도 엔터티가 이 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: There is no <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> instance associated with objects in the <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Detached" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry" /> 상태의 개체와 연결된 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Detached" /> 인스턴스가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the scalar properties on the object was modified and the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> method has not been called.
trans-unit.target: 개체의 스칼라 속성 중 하나가 수정되었으며 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> 메서드가 호출되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: In POCO entities without change-tracking proxies, the state of the modified properties changes to <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Modified" /> when the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 변경 내용 추적 프록시가 없는 POCO 엔터티에서 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Modified" /> 메서드가 호출되면 수정된 속성의 상태가 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.DetectChanges" />로 변경됩니다.

trans-unit.source: After the changes are saved, the object state changes to <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Unchanged" />.
trans-unit.target: 변경 내용이 저장된 후에는 개체 상태가 <see cref="F:System.Data.EntityState.Unchanged" />로 변경됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The object has not been modified since it was attached to the context or since the last time that the <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 컨텍스트에 연결되거나 <see cref="M:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges" /> 메서드가 마지막으로 호출된 이후 개체가 수정되지 않았습니다.
